A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall\, I did like the movie.  Kelly Marie Tran was great as Rose as well as Oscar Isaac as Poe Dameron.  John Boyega was okay as Finn.  However\, this movie\, did not have some elements I was expecting it to have.  I expected Kylo Ren to turn to the good side and Rey to turn to the Sith.  But Rey remained a Rebel and Kylo Ren was a Sith.  Also\, Rey never uses the Force to fight off a powerful Sith\, like Supreme Leader Snoke (who was killed by Ren). But some of the action scenes were good and Carrie Fisher was able to do well before her death.
